name: Helicopter Strike Forces War
description:
Helicopter Strike Forces War is a helicopter action game that combines stunning 3D graphics with flight control simulation strike force and engaging military scenarios to pull you into an strike force air fighter immersive combat experience the moment you start the helicopter game battle app army group command.
Features:

Air strike to save you
High Quality Chopper
Heavy Gunship Helicopter
Challenging missions
Realistic 3d environments
Attack Air helicopter
Multiple Gunship War Helicopters
